attributes.action: Removal of religious context from the current constitution
attributes.additional_details:
I propose a referendum on the religious orientation of the people of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland with those people answering whether they are religious or not.
If the majority of the voters (>50%) say they are not religious then there should be a removal of all religious context from the current constitution and all links between the government and any religious organisations should be broken as religious organisations would not be in the public interest.
